desc:
Yes, our Oasis is the most breathable model on the market. All this thanks to an exclusive 3D surface that makes the air flow constant. You will feel the true breathability.
In addition, we have made some small adjustments to make it even more comfortable.
The biggest change comes from the fact that we increased x2 the density of the expanded EVA of the sole, getting more comfort on foot impact.Last but not least, we have added a few specks of color to the sole to add a dash of color to your summer.
style:
